snippet: Paulie Malignaggi rebounded from being knocked down in the second round to record a unanimous decision over Zab Judah in a welterweight bout.
lead_paragraph: Paulie Malignaggi rebounded from being knocked down in the second round to record a unanimous decision over Zab Judah in a welterweight bout.

headline.main: Malignaggi Dominates Judah to Claim Battle of Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Malignaggi Dominates Judah to Claim Battle of Brooklyn
